rules_text:
When Flowstone Orrery enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Flowstone Orrery leaves the battlefield.
Grand evolution 3–{3}{W} [i]({3}{W}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put three +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
